Miles Sound System SDK 6.1c

DDK Support Routines for XMIDI Sound Drivers

Discussion

These functions are provided by MSS_MDI.INC, the standard assembly-language header file for MSS .MDI drivers. Chosen from among the functions needed by most MIDI sound drivers, these routines should be used whenever possible to accelerate driver development and debugging. This section is intended to serve as a quick-reference guide to the MSS_MDI.INC support functions; refer to their implementations in MSS_MDI.INC and their associated variables for more information. The example drivers included with MSS make extensive use of these functions.

DDK Support Routines for XMIDI Sound Drivers
DDK XMIDI Function: INT66H_dispatch
DDK XMIDI Function: MDI_init
DDK XMIDI Function: ASC_val
DDK XMIDI Function: RAD_wait
